reason.raw:
Upward and downward range sensing were incorporated using point lidar sensors in the following models:
X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_6
SSCI_X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_1
SSCI_X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_2
reason.html: Upward and downward range sensing were incorporated using point lidar sensors in the following models: X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_6 SSCI_X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 SSCI_X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_2

description.raw:
Add sonar sensors pointing up and down on the X4 sensor configuration #2. Sonar sensors are common on real UAV systems. Unsure how to bridge ign to ros msgs in for the ignition version of this sensor configuration.

Add dependency:

`sudo apt install ros-melodic-hector-sensors-description`

We are certainly open to all teams using this set of sensors.  The sonars could potentially be added to all X4 configurations.
